response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to you. I understand its significance and am confident it will serve as a valuable asset in your endeavors. To facilitate this transaction, I am offering the product to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my commitment to ensuring you receive the best possible deal. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1200000}
